name: Vietnamese Quốc Ngữ (Saigon dialect)
region: Southern Vietnam (Ho Chi Minh City region)
description: Latin-based Vietnamese orthography with tone diacritics, representing the Saigon (Southern Vietnamese) dialect pronunciation. This variety is characterized by specific phonetic realizations that may differ from Northern (Hanoi) and Central Vietnamese dialects.

source.title: Vietnamese Phonology and Orthography: Southern Dialect
source.author: Various linguistic sources
